name: Falling Blocks!
description:
Hello everyone! You may have never seen me before but I'm just trying to learn coding and stuff. I've done a few projects but didn't complete them. So this is my first one. Yes it was off a tutorial, but, I added these features!

1. Main Menu

2. Music

3. Just 1 sound effect (It's my first game so don't expect much)

4. "Powerups" Their more like Powerdowns than anything (Just look at How To Play)

Hope you enjoy my first game!
